title: Rename package fails to verify resource writability
description: The 'Rename package' function doesn't verify the writability of all resources.
OB: Create a package containing a CU (Class Unit) and set the CU to read-only. Attempt to rename the package. Observation: Upon completion, an unexpected exception dialog appears.
EB: Precondition checks should verify the writability of files within packages before allowing package renaming.
SR:
1. Create a package with a CU inside.
2. Set the CU to read-only.
3. Attempt to rename the package.
4. Note the appearance of an unexpected exception dialog.
